mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, password, email, name, nickname, birth, profile_image_path, created_at, updated_at) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birth}, #{profileImagePath}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: select exists(SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId})
select exists(SELECT email FROM user WHERE email = #{email})
